title: boobooXie
author: boobooXie
content: Hi, everyone! I'm in China. I'm the guy blocked bitcoin in MTGOX. Now I want get my bitcoin back, but i can't  pass EKYC process of MTGOX. i always failed in first step of EKYC: when I commit my passport picture, the system always says: "An error has occurred. Please try again.", what I can do now? Does anyone know about how to pass EKYC of MTGOX?

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: boobooXie on January 07, 2023, 02:10:49 PMwhat I can do now? Does anyone know about how to pass EKYC of MTGOX?@boobooXie, MtGox exchange, had a long discussion on this forum, the problem you are facing, if I notice for the umpteenth time a user I see has a problem with KYC on MtGox exchange,Example:MTGOX Claim Identity Verification - I am blocked, can't select Repayment MethodHowever, I've seen @nanobtc, say something here.Quote from: nanobtc on March 22, 2019, 01:17:41 PMYou might contact them here:If you cannot log into the System and check the results of the approval or disapproval of your filed claims online, please contact our email support at the following email address:Email: support@mtgox.com Rehabilitation Debtor: MtGox Co., Ltd.Rehabilitation Trustee: Nobuaki Kobayashi, Attorney-at-lawMaybe, for your solution about KYC withdrawal/recovery of your Btc on MtGox exchange, I think you can try to discuss in this thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=179586.6900, or you can ask for more information to the users in the thread, hopefully it helps you in recovering your btc on the MtGox exchange.

comments.author: boobooXie
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on January 08, 2023, 02:16:44 PMQuote from: boobooXie on January 07, 2023, 02:10:49 PMwhat I can do now? Does anyone know about how to pass EKYC of MTGOX?@boobooXie, MtGox exchange, had a long discussion on this forum, the problem you are facing, if I notice for the umpteenth time a user I see has a problem with KYC on MtGox exchange,Example:MTGOX Claim Identity Verification - I am blocked, can't select Repayment MethodHowever, I've seen @nanobtc, say something here.Quote from: nanobtc on March 22, 2019, 01:17:41 PMYou might contact them here:If you cannot log into the System and check the results of the approval or disapproval of your filed claims online, please contact our email support at the following email address:Email: support@mtgox.com Rehabilitation Debtor: MtGox Co., Ltd.Rehabilitation Trustee: Nobuaki Kobayashi, Attorney-at-lawMaybe, for your solution about KYC withdrawal/recovery of your Btc on MtGox exchange, I think you can try to discuss in this thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=179586.6900, or you can ask for more information to the users in the thread, hopefully it helps you in recovering your btc on the MtGox exchange.@YOSHIE, it's a little bit different, anyhow, thank you for your reply, I will try more.
